title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 

(Section 12A(2)) (Covid-19) (No. 4) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited redundancy payment act 1967 (section 12a(2)) (covid-19) (no 4) order 2020

title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2021 is hereby specified as the date to which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2021 is hereby specified as the date to which the 
emergency period, as defined in subsection (5) of section 12A (inserted by 
section 29 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 
2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 (No. 21 of 
1967), shall be extended. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [545]
text_norm: 2 31st day march 2021 hereby specified date emergency period defined subsection (5) section 12a (inserted section 29 emergency measure public interest (covid-19) act 2020 (no 2 2020)) redundancy payment act 1967 (no 21 1967) shall extended given official seal government 24 november 2020 micheal martin taoiseach 4 545

title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order extends, until 31st March 2021, the emergency period during which 
section 12 of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 shall not have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [545] 5
